languages.text: {n}Соломон осторожно берет его кончиками пальцев. Его взгляд наполнен теплом.{/n} "Спасибо, что сохранил{mf||а} его. Это мое... признание вины много для меня значило. Я сидел над этой жалкой парой строчек всю ночь".

{n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон осторожно берет его кончиками пальцев. Его взгляд наполнен теплом.{/n} "Спасибо, что сохранил{mf||а} его. Это мое... признание вины много для меня значило. Я сидел над этой жалкой парой строчек всю ночь".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはためらいながら手紙を受け取り、指先だけでそれに触れた。彼の目は温かさに満ちていた。{/n}「持っていてくださり、ありがとうございます。この…罪の告白は私にとって大きな意味を持っていました。わずかな数行の文章を、一晩じゅう悩みながら考えていたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはためらいながら手紙を受け取り、指先だけでそれに触れた。彼の目は温かさに満ちていた。{/n}「持っていてくださり、ありがとうございます。この…罪の告白は私にとって大きな意味を持っていました。わずかな数行の文章を、一晩じゅう悩みながら考えていたのです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nimmt den Brief zögernd entgegen, berührt ihn aber nur mit den Fingerspitzen. Sein Blick ist voller Wärme.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr ihn behalten habt. Dieses ... Schuldeingeständnis hat mir sehr viel bedeutet. Ich habe eine ganze Nacht über diesen erbärmlich wenigen Sätzen gesessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne nimmt den Brief zögernd entgegen, berührt ihn aber nur mit den Fingerspitzen. Sein Blick ist voller Wärme.{/n} "Danke, dass Ihr ihn behalten habt. Dieses ... Schuldeingeständnis hat mir sehr viel bedeutet. Ich habe eine ganze Nacht über diesen erbärmlich wenigen Sätzen gesessen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne prend la lettre avec hésitation, en l'effleurant à peine du bout des doigts. Son regard est empreint de chaleur.{/n} « Merci de l'avoir gardée. Cet... aveu de culpabilité signifie beaucoup pour moi. J'ai passé une nuit entière à chercher la bonne formulation pour ces deux pauvres phrases toutes simples. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne prend la lettre avec hésitation, en l'effleurant à peine du bout des doigts. Son regard est empreint de chaleur.{/n} « Merci de l'avoir gardée. Cet... aveu de culpabilité signifie beaucoup pour moi. J'ai passé une nuit entière à chercher la bonne formulation pour ces deux pauvres phrases toutes simples. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne toma la carta con gesto vacilante, tocándola únicamente con la punta de los dedos. Su mirada es cálida.{/n} «Gracias por conservarla. Esta... admisión de culpa significa mucho para mí. Me pasé la noche en vela debatiéndome por redactar estas míseras frases».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne toma la carta con gesto vacilante, tocándola únicamente con la punta de los dedos. Su mirada es cálida.{/n} «Gracias por conservarla. Esta... admisión de culpa significa mucho para mí. Me pasé la noche en vela debatiéndome por redactar estas míseras frases».

languages.text: {n}索罗门用指尖触碰着信，犹疑地收下了。他的目光中充满了暖意。{/n}“谢谢你留着这封信，这场……认罪……对我而言意义重大。我花了一整晚的时间，烦恼着该如何写下这几个微不足道的句子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗门用指尖触碰着信，犹疑地收下了。他的目光中充满了暖意。{/n}“谢谢你留着这封信，这场……认罪……对我而言意义重大。我花了一整晚的时间，烦恼着该如何写下这几个微不足道的句子。”

languages.text: {n}Tereddütte kalan Solomorne, dilekçeyi parmak uçlarıyla alıyor. Samimiyetle yüzüne bakıyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Kabahatimi itiraf etmek benim için çok şey ifade ediyordu, şu birkaç satır uğruna bir gece boyunca kıvrandım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne dilekçeyi tereddüt ederek parmak uçlarıyla alır. Samimiyetle yüzüne bakar.{/n} "Sakladığınız için teşekkür ederim. Bu kabahatimi itiraf etmek benim için çok şey ifade ediyordu, şu birkaç satır uğruna bir gece boyunca kıvrandım."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the letter tentatively, touching it only with his fingertips. His eyes are full of warmth.{/n} "Thank you for keeping it. This... admission of guilt meant a great deal to me. I spent a whole night agonising over these paltry couple of sentences."
